import React, {useRef} from "react"; import './search-bar.css' import { Col, Form, FormGroup } from "reactstrap"; const SearchBar = () => { const locationRef = userRef('') const distanceRef = userRef('') const maxGroupSizeRef = userRef('') const searchHandler = () => { const location = locationRef.current.value const distance = distanceRef.current.value const maxGroupSize = maxGroupSizeRef.current.value } return
location
